text: niscayanga mi posakudu, prabhuvu ayina allah, akasalanu mariyu bhumini aru dinamulalo (ayyam lalo) srstinci, tarvata tana sinhasananni (ars nu) adhistincadu. Ayane (sarvasrsti) vyavaharalanu naduputunnadu. Ayana anumati lekunda sipharasu ceyagalavadu evvadu ledu. Ayane allah! Mi posakudu (prabhuvu), kavuna miru ayanane aradhincandi. Emi? Miru hitopadesam svikarincara
